title: Sleeping Beauty’s Sweets - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Magic   Nobles   Short Story   Sleeping   Student-Teacher Relationship
author: Konohana Sakuya   このはなさくや
description:
I am a 2nd year senior high magic school leftover — Phyllis Magica.

Magic is no good, athletic ability is no good, studies are no good, only special skill is… to sleep!?

This female princess was raising up a love fantasy.>
